Handler
public class DirContextURLStreamHandler
extends URLStreamHandler

Stream handler to a JNDI directory context.

setProtocolHandler

public static void setProtocolHandler()
Set the java.protocol.handler.pkgs system property. For use when embedding Tomcat and the embedding application has already set its own URLStreamHandlerFactory.
